name: sofe
description: Sofe is a self-hosted feedback and idea board for web apps. It lets users submit, vote, and comment on feature requests via a simple UI, helping prioritize development.

features.title: Feature Requests
features.description: Collects user feedback and feature suggestions

features.title: Voting System
features.description: Allows users to upvote ideas to prioritize development

features.title: Comment Threads
features.description: Discusses feature requests with threaded comments

features.title: Status Tracking
features.description: Marks requests as planned, in progress, or completed

features.title: Roadmap View
features.description: Displays planned features in public roadmap

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Requires login to submit and vote on ideas

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alerts users when their requests are updated
